channel.title: CVE Feed for Facebook -- Facebook Gameroom
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Facebook -- Facebook Gameroom

item.title: CVE-2021-24030|2024-08-03T19:21:17.165Z -- facebook -- facebook%20gameroom
item.description: The fbgames protocol handler registered as part of Facebook Gameroom does not properly quote arguments passed to the executable. That allows a malicious URL to cause code execution. This issue affects versions prior to v1.26.0.
